thread.section_title: iQ Hotel Roma - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Modern Hotel - Great Location!
thread.title_full: Modern Hotel - Great Location! - Review of iQ Hotel Roma, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: nichlo12
title: Modern Hotel - Great Location!
text: Hotel is in a fantastic location, which is just around the corner from Termini. The hotel itself is very modern and staff are very helpful and friendly. Room is extremely comfortable and fantastic value for money! I would definitely stay here when visiting Rome again!
